query:
SELECT
            lk.key,
            lk.context,
            lt.singular,
            lt.plural
        FROM localization_translations lt
        INNER JOIN localization_keys lk ON lk.id = lt.localization_key_id
        INNER JOIN locales l ON l.id = lt.locale_id
        WHERE l.locale_code = $1
        ORDER BY lk.key ASC
